tool_description: Manages direct mail campaigns including address validation, postal requirements, printing coordination, and mailing logistics for donor outreach.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the direct mail campaign

mailing_list.description: List of recipient identifiers for mailing addresses

mail_piece_type.description: Type of mail piece: letter, postcard, brochure, or package

postal_class.description: USPS mail class: first_class, standard, or nonprofit

target_mail_date.description: Target date for mail to be sent

validate_addresses.description: Whether to perform USPS address validation

budget_limit.description: Maximum budget for the mailing campaign

error_messages: Invalid campaign ID: The specified campaign_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Insufficient quantity: Minimum 50 recipients required for direct mail campaigns.
Invalid mail type: mail_piece_type must be one of: letter, postcard, brochure, package.
Invalid postal class: postal_class must be one of: first_class, standard, nonprofit.
Vendor unavailable: The selected print_vendor is not available or not approved.
Target date too soon: target_mail_date must allow sufficient time for printing and postal processing.
Budget exceeded: Estimated campaign cost exceeds specified budget_limit.
Address validation failed: Significant number of addresses failed USPS validation.
usage: Specify campaign_id, mailing_list, mail_piece_type, postal_class, print_vendor, and target_mail_date. Optionally enable validate_addresses, request_tracking, and set budget_limit. Returns campaign logistics and cost estimates.

estimated_cost.description: Estimated total campaign cost including printing and postage

production_timeline.description: Timeline summary for printing and mailing process

logistics_summary.description: Summary of campaign logistics and next steps
